entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:19 AM MST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow near the Rockies. Amount 2 cm near the Rockies. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 06:19 AM MST Saturday 25 March 2023
